input_email_body:
Subject: 

Dear Customer Support, I am reaching out to inquire about the data analytics services you offer to help optimize investment strategies You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. Could you provide details on the types of analytics you offer and how they can be applied to investment decisions? I would greatly appreciate any information you can provide on the benefits of using these services, such as increased returns and reduced risk My name is Elena Ivanova.. Additionally, I would like to know about the customization options you offer for tailored solutions to individual investors. Thank you, I am looking forward to hearing back from you. Best regards.
